rules: Rule1: Provided that the device ban bill was proposed in congress, it was reviewed by the committee.
Rule2: In the event that the device ban bill was declared unconstitutional by the supreme court, it was overturned by the supreme court.
Rule3: Either the device ban bill was declared unconstitutional by the supreme court, or if it was proposed in congress, then the device ban was implemented in the national region.
Rule4: Should the device ban bill be challenged in the lower court, it would be appealed to the appeals court.
Rule5: If the device ban bill was debated in congress, then the device ban was implemented in the national region.
Rule6: Provided that the device ban bill was reviewed by the committee, it was amended by the committee.
Rule7: In cases where the device ban bill was amended by the committee, it was debated in congress.
Rule8: If the device ban bill was passed by congress, then the device ban was implemented in the national region.
Rule9: If the tech industry lobbied congress, then if the device ban bill was proposed in congress, the device ban was implemented in the national region.
Rule10: If it is not the case that if the device ban bill was supported by the majority party then it was passed by congress, then the device ban bill was vetoed by the president.

Rule11: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that either environmental groups protested to congress or the tech industry lobbied congress then the device ban bill was investigated by the ethics committee, then congress members were impeached by the ethics committee.
Rule12: In the event that the device ban bill was not passed by congress, it was challenged in the lower court.
facts: Fact1: The device ban bill was proposed in congress.
Fact2: The device ban bill was supported by the majority party.
Fact3: It is not the case that the device ban bill was investigated by the ethics committee.
Fact4: It is not the case that congress members were impeached by the ethics committee.
Fact5: It is not the case that the device ban bill was overturned by the supreme court.
Fact6: It is not the case that the device ban bill was appealed to the appeals court.
Fact7: It is not the case that the device ban bill was vetoed by the president.

question: The device ban was implemented in the national region.
